intro:
Cela fait deux ans que Matt à disparu.
La police a lachée l'affaire depuis longtemps, mais pas moi.

Je viens enfin d'avoir l'autorisation de fouiller sa maison.
Je n'ai pas beaucoup d'espoir, mais...
room:
It's the room where Matt did his researches.
I did not imagine it like that.
It's quite unusual for a physician.
book:
The book seems ancient and precious.
I cannot read the whole title,
I can only read "Dagfin"

It's the handwritting of Matt !
It's dated of yesterday !
I knew Matt was still alive !

Deep blood of a Wrecked
Eye of the fortuneteller
Center of the One
I should search for these objects.
blood: The smell... ew ! Looks like it's blood.
blood2: I don't even know what is a Wrecked, but it seems to be blood.
femur2: I wouldn't want to cross the path of the beast which had such bones.
collar: The stone has an eery glow...
collar2: At least, this one is not so twisted.
carpet:
This carpet doesn't fit with the room.
Matt always had strange taste.
It seems there's something on the floor, under this awful carpet !
pentacle:
I don't know what matter was used to draw this.
It seems freshly drawn.
invoc:
There's something else written at the bottom of the first page...
Let's see that !
"Ni'eht gnirebmuls ytic fo Yl'her, Dagfin pli sa'nds meard"
